price: 14. Ku socota indhahayaga hortood (waxaana harqinnay gaaladii) ka jaazeyn gaalnimadooda (iyo u hiillin ahaan kan la diiday Nuux cs).
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
